OMax Documentation

Version 5beta

This project ports Factor Oracle into MaxMSP in the context of OMax software



The initial development has been made with Apple XCode 3.1.2 on a MacBook (processor intel Core 2 Duo) running Mac OS 10.5.7 (Leopard) with Max 5.0.7 (38325) and MaxSDK-5.0.6.
Further development and testing have been done on a MacBook Pro Unibody running successive versions of MacOSX, XCode, Max5, Max6 and MaxSDK up to MacOS 10.8.5, XCode 5.0.2, Max 6.1.5, MaxSDK 6.1.4
